description: Continue to contribute to the growth and usage of Vocabulary. Fixing issues, adding new features and making code reviews
Attend open source community review meetings
Contributed to revamping Creative Commons's new design system; Vocabulary. Building and organising each UI component, fixing issues and adding new features from Figma mockups
Learned new technical skills (Vue, Storybook, Bulma)
Improved soft skills in communication, time management and problem solving
Worked with other developers to extend the usage of Vocabulary to other Creative Commons platforms
Developed Idearoom; a tool for businesses and teams to organize their project ideas, plan and analysis
I worked majorly with the Lead frontend developer on the frontend using React, Redux and React-i18next
Also worked with other developers to integrate Idealroom to the Innoloft main whitelabel react application
Built responsive and progressive web applications
